Text:
These guys KICK ASS!!! Best thing to happen to rock in years! I have all their albums on vinyl so I really don't feel too bad about snatching this up.

Catch em' live if you can!
Can we possibly get this in another format other than WMA?
dont bitch about the format, it's lossless you nutfuck! you can convert it to anything you want with zero loss of quality after you've downloaded it.
oh, and thanks for the awesome album!
Hell, since I prefer FLAC, too, I'll convert it and re-upload this in FLAC as soon as I'm done downloading.
For the upload you rock as much as they do. Bought this album when it came out but lost the cd. much appreciated!!

The complaint on WMA is because it's WMAv9, and there are no open-source decoders for the format yet.
Thanks anyway.
